welcome.title: Uncover Kenya's Hidden Treasures
welcome.intro: From diverse landscapes to vibrant cultures and unmatched wildlife, Kenya offers an adventure unlike any other. Start your journey with us and experience the magic of this beautiful land!

slides.title: Nairobi - The City in the Wild
slides.description: A blend of modern city life and thrilling wildlife experiences.

slides.title: Mombasa - Coastal Paradise
slides.description: Vibrant culture, pristine beaches, and rich history await you.

slides.title: Kisumu - Lakeside Charm
slides.description: A vibrant city by Lake Victoria, known for stunning sunsets, cultural heritage, and bustling markets.

slides.title: Masai Mara - Safari Adventure
slides.description: One of the most famous safari destinations, home to the Great Migration.

slides.title: Lake Nakuru - Flamingo Haven
slides.description: A sanctuary for wildlife, famous for its flamingos and rhinos.

slides.title: Mount Kenya - Majestic Peaks
slides.description: The highest mountain in Kenya, offering incredible hiking and scenic views.

slides.title: Lamu - Island Serenity
slides.description: Step back in time in this ancient town with Swahili culture and beautiful beaches.

slides.title: Tsavo - Wilderness Unbound
slides.description: One of Kenya's largest national parks, famed for its red elephants and vast landscapes.

slides.title: Aberdare Range - Misty Mountains
slides.description: A lush mountainous area known for its waterfalls, forests, and diverse wildlife.

slides.title: Samburu - Untamed Beauty
slides.description: A less-crowded reserve known for its unique wildlife and vibrant Samburu culture.

slides.title: Hell's Gate - Adventure Playground
slides.description: A unique landscape with geothermal features, cliffs, and opportunities for rock climbing.

slides.title: Diani Beach - Tropical Bliss
slides.description: White sandy beaches, clear waters, and a favorite for water sports enthusiasts.

slides.title: Laikipia Plateau - Wildlife Haven
slides.description: Home to endangered species, conservation projects, and luxury eco-lodges.

slides.title: Malindi - Historical Coastline
slides.description: Rich in history with ancient ruins, golden beaches, and a Swahili culture blend.

slides.title: Chyulu Hills - Lava Landscape
slides.description: Volcanic hills with stunning landscapes, caves, and incredible biodiversity.

slides.title: Meru National Park - Wild Escape
slides.description: Diverse wildlife and lush landscapes make this a hidden gem for nature lovers.

slides.title: Ol Pejeta Conservancy - Rhino Sanctuary
slides.description: A haven for rhinos and a leading example in wildlife conservation.

slides.title: Mount Elgon - Untamed Beauty
slides.description: Kenyaâ€™s second-highest mountain with scenic trails, caves, and waterfalls.

slides.title: Thomson Falls - Scenic Waterfall
slides.description: A breathtaking waterfall in Nyahururu, surrounded by lush greenery.

slides.title: Shimba Hills - Coastal Forest
slides.description: Tropical forest near the coast, with waterfalls, rare plants, and rich wildlife.
